001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
006import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
007import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
008import java.nio.charset.Charset;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException;
011import java.util.EnumSet;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Map.Entry;
015import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
016import java.util.ServiceConfigurationError;
017import java.util.ServiceLoader;
018import java.util.Set;
019import java.util.Spliterators.AbstractSpliterator;
020import java.util.function.Consumer;
021import java.util.function.Function;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
024
025import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
026import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
027
028import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
029import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheConfig;
030import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
031import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType.UnspecifiedContentType;
032import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter;
033import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter.UnspecifiedFormatter;
034import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheName;
035import io.jstach.jstache.JStachePath;
036import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
037import io.jstach.jstachio.Output.EncodedOutput;
038import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
039import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
040import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.Html;
041import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.PlainText;
042import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.DefaultFormatter;
043import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.SpecFormatter;
044import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.TemplateInfos.SimpleTemplateInfo;
045
046/**
047 *
048 * Locates generated templates by their model via reflection.
049 * <p>
050 * This utility class is useful if you plan on implementing your own {@link JStachio} and
051 * or other integrations.
052 *
053 * @apiNote In order to use reflection in a modular setup one must <code>open</code>
054 * packages to the {@link io.jstach.jstachio/ } module.
055 * @author agentgt
056 *
057 */
058public final class Templates {
059
060        private Templates() {
061        }
062
063        /**
064         * A utility method that will check if the templates encoding matches the outputs
065         * encoding.
066         * @param template template charset to check
067         * @param output an encoded output expecting the template charset to be the same.
068         * @throws UnsupportedCharsetException if the charsets do not match
069         */
070        public static void validateEncoding(TemplateInfo template, EncodedOutput<?> output) {
071                if (!template.templateCharset().equals(output.charset())) {
072                        throw new UnsupportedCharsetException(
073                                        "The encoding of the template does not match the output. template charset="
074                                                        + template.templateCharset() + ", output charset=" + output.charset());
075                }
076        }
077
078        /**
079         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
080         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. This method is effectively calls
081         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
082         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config.
083         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
084         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
085         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
086         * not the Templates class</em>)
087         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
088         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
089         * template was found.
090         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
091         */
092        public static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) throws Exception {
093                EnumSet<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies = EnumSet.noneOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
094
095                for (var s : ALL_STRATEGIES) {
096                        if (s.isEnabled(config)) {
097                                strategies.add(s);
098                        }
099                }
100                var classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(modelType.getClassLoader());
101
102                Logger logger = config.getLogger(Templates.class.getCanonicalName());
103
104                Exception error;
105                try {
106                        Template<?> r = Templates.getTemplate(modelType, strategies, classLoaders, logger);
107                        return r;
108                }
109                catch (Exception e) {
110                        error = e;
111                }
112                if (!config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE)) {
113                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.WARNING)) {
114                                logger.log(Level.WARNING,
115                                                "Could not find generated template and will try reflection for model type: " + modelType,
116                                                error);
117                        }
118                        return getInfoByReflection(modelType);
119
120                }
121                throw error;
122
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * Finds template info by accessing JStache annotations through reflective lookup.
127         * <p>
128         * This allows you to lookup template meta data <strong>regardless of whether or not
129         * the annotation processor has generated code</strong>. This method is mainly used
130         * for fallback mechanisms and extensions.
131         * <p>
132         * Why might you need the reflective data instead of the static generated meta data?
133         * Well often times the annotation processor in a hot reload environment such as
134         * JRebel, JBoss modules, or Spring Reload has not generated the code from a JStache
135         * model and or it is not desired. This allows reflection based engines like JMustache
136         * to keep working even if code is not generated.
137         * @param modelType the class that is annotated with {@link JStache}
138         * @return template info meta data
139         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
140         */
141        public static TemplateInfo getInfoByReflection(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
142                return TemplateInfos.templateOf(modelType);
143        }
144
145        /**
146         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
147         * @param <T> the model type
148         * @param clazz the model type
149         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
150         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
151         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
152         */
153        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> clazz) throws Exception {
154                List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(clazz.getClassLoader());
155                return (Template<T>) getTemplate(clazz, ALL_STRATEGIES, classLoaders, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
160         * @param <T> the model type
161         * @param modelType the model type
162         * @param strategies load strategies
163         * @param classLoaders class loaders to try loading
164         * @param logger used to log attempted strategies. If you do not want to log use
165         * {@link JStachioConfig#noopLogger()}.
166         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
167         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
168         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
169         *
170         */
171        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> modelType, Iterable<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies,
172                        Iterable<ClassLoader> classLoaders, System.Logger logger) throws Exception {
173
174                for (TemplateLoadStrategy s : strategies) {
175                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.DEBUG)) {
176                                logger.log(Level.DEBUG, "For modelType: \"" + modelType + "\" trying strategy: \"" + s + "\"");
177                        }
178                        for (ClassLoader classLoader : classLoaders) {
179                                try {
180                                        Template<T> template = s.load(modelType, classLoader, logger);
181                                        if (template != null) {
182                                                return template;
183                                        }
184                                }
185                                catch (ClassNotFoundException | TemplateNotFoundException e) {
186                                        continue;
187                                }
188                        }
189                }
190                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
191        }
192
193        static boolean isReflectionTemplate(TemplateInfo template) {
194                if (template instanceof SimpleTemplateInfo si) {
195                        return true;
196                }
197                return false;
198        }
199
200        private static final Set<TemplateLoadStrategy> ALL_STRATEGIES = EnumSet.allOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
201
202        /**
203         * Strategy to load templates dynamically.
204         *
205         * @author agentgt
206         *
207         */
208        public enum TemplateLoadStrategy {
209
210                /**
211                 * Strategy that will try the {@link ServiceLoader} with the SPI of
212                 * {@link TemplateProvider}.
213                 */
214                SERVICE_LOADER() {
215                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
216                        @Override
217                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
218                                        throws Exception {
219                                return (Template<T>) templateByServiceLoader(clazz, classLoader, logger);
220                        }
221
222                        @Override
223                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
224                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.SERVICELOADER_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
225                        }
226                },
227                /**
228                 * Strategy that will try no-arg constructor
229                 */
230                CONSTRUCTOR() {
231                        @Override
232                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
233                                        throws Exception {
234                                return templateByConstructor(clazz, classLoader);
235                        }
236
237                        @Override
238                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
239                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
240                        }
241
242                };
243
244                protected abstract <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
245                                throws Exception;
246
247                protected abstract boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config);
248
249        }
250
251        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
252        private static <T> @Nullable Template<T> templateByConstructor(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader)
253                        throws Exception {
254                Class<?> implementation = (Class<?>) classLoader.loadClass(resolveName(clazz));
255                Constructor<?> constructor = implementation.getDeclaredConstructor();
256                constructor.setAccessible(true);
257                return (Template<T>) constructor.newInstance();
258        }
259
260        private static String resolveName(Class<?> c) {
261                var a = c.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
262                String cname;
263                if (a == null || a.name().isBlank()) {
264
265                        JStacheName name = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).flatMap(config -> Stream.of(config.naming()))
266                                        .findFirst().orElse(null);
267
268                        String prefix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.prefix();
269
270                        String suffix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.suffix();
271
272                        prefix = prefix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
273                        suffix = suffix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
274
275                        cname = prefix + c.getSimpleName() + suffix;
276                }
277                else {
278                        cname = a.name();
279                }
280                String packageName = c.getPackageName();
281                String fqn = packageName + (packageName.isEmpty() ? "" : ".") + cname;
282                return fqn;
283        }
284
285        private static Charset resolveCharset(Class<?> c) {
286                String charset = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).map(config -> config.charset())
287                                .filter(cs -> !cs.isEmpty()).findFirst().orElse(null);
288                if (charset == null) {
289                        return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
290                }
291                return Charset.forName(charset);
292        }
293
294        static <A extends Annotation> Stream<A> findAnnotations(Class<?> c, Class<A> annotationClass) {
295                var s = annotationElements(c);
296                return s.filter(p -> p != null).map(p -> p.getAnnotation(annotationClass)).filter(a -> a != null);
297        }
298
299        private static @NonNull Stream<AnnotatedElement> annotationElements(Class<?> c) {
300                Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> enclosing = enclosing(c).flatMap(Templates::expandUsing);
301                var s = Stream.concat(enclosing, Stream.of(c.getPackage(), c.getModule()));
302                return s;
303        }
304
305        /*
306         * This is to get referenced config of JStacheConfig.using
307         */
308        private static Stream<Class<?>> expandUsing(Class<?> e) {
309
310                JStacheConfig config = e.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
311                if (config == null) {
312                        return Stream.of(e);
313                }
314                var using = config.using();
315                if (!using.equals(void.class)) {
316                        return Stream.of(e, using);
317                }
318                return Stream.of(e);
319        }
320
321        private static Stream<Class<?>> enclosing(Class<?> e) {
322                AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>> split = new AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>>(Long.MAX_VALUE, 0) {
323                        @Nullable
324                        Class<?> current = e;
325
326                        @Override
327                        public boolean tryAdvance(Consumer<? super Class<?>> action) {
328                                if (current == null) {
329                                        return false;
330                                }
331                                var c = current;
332                                current = current.getEnclosingClass();
333                                action.accept(c);
334                                return true;
335                        }
336                };
337                return StreamSupport.stream(split, false);
338        }
339
340        private static <T> @Nullable Template<?> templateByServiceLoader(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader,
341                        System.Logger logger) {
342                ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(TemplateProvider.class, classLoader);
343                var it = loader.iterator();
344                while (it.hasNext()) {
345                        try {
346                                var templateProvider = it.next();
347                                for (var t : templateProvider.provideTemplates()) {
348                                        if (t.supportsType(clazz)) {
349                                                return t;
350                                        }
351                                }
352                        }
353                        catch (ServiceConfigurationError e) {
354                                logger.log(Level.ERROR, "Template provider failed to load. Skipping it.", e);
355                        }
356                }
357                return null;
358        }
359
360        private static List<ClassLoader> collectClassLoaders(@Nullable ClassLoader classLoader) {
361                return Stream.of(classLoader, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), Template.class.getClassLoader())
362                                .filter(cl -> cl != null).toList();
363        }
364
365        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
366        static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
367                throw (E) x;
368        }
369
370        /**
371         * Resolve path lookup information reflectively from a model class by doing config
372         * resolution at runtime.
373         * @param model a class annotated with JStache
374         * @return the resolved path annotation
375         * @apiNote This method is an implementation detail for reflection rendering engines
376         * such as JMustache and JStachio's future reflection based engine. It is recommended
377         * you do not rely on it as it is subject to change in the future.
378         */
379        public static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
380                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
381                return annotationElements(model).map(TemplateInfos::resolvePathOnElement).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
382                                .orElse(null);
383        }
384
385        static class TemplateInfos {
386
387                public static TemplateInfo templateOf(Class<?> model) throws Exception {
388                        JStache stache = model.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
389                        if (stache == null) {
390                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
391                                                "Model class is not annotated with " + JStache.class.getSimpleName() + ". class: " + model);
392                        }
393                        @Nullable
394                        JStachePath pathConfig = resolvePath(model);
395                        String templateString = stache.template();
396
397                        final String templateName = resolveName(model);
398                        String path = stache.path();
399                        String templatePath;
400                        if (templateString.isEmpty() && path.isEmpty()) {
401                                String folder = model.getPackageName().replace('.', '/');
402                                folder = folder.isEmpty() ? folder : folder + "/";
403                                templatePath = folder + model.getSimpleName();
404                        }
405                        else if (!path.isEmpty()) {
406                                templatePath = path;
407                        }
408                        else {
409                                templatePath = "";
410                        }
411                        if (pathConfig != null && !templatePath.isBlank()) {
412                                templatePath = pathConfig.prefix() + templatePath + pathConfig.suffix();
413                        }
414
415                        // Class<?> templateContentType =
416                        // EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.nullToDefault(stache.contentType());
417
418                        var ee = EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.providesFromModelType(model, stache);
419                        Function<String, String> templateEscaper = ee.getValue();
420                        Class<?> templateContentType = ee.getKey();
421                        String templateMediaType = "";
422                        var jstacheContentType = templateContentType.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
423                        if (jstacheContentType != null) {
424                                templateMediaType = jstacheContentType.mediaType();
425                        }
426                        Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter = FormatterProvider.INSTANCE
427                                        .providesFromModelType(model, stache).getValue();
428
429                        Charset templateCharset = resolveCharset(model);
430
431                        long lastLoaded = System.currentTimeMillis();
432                        return new SimpleTemplateInfo( //
433                                        templateName, //
434                                        templatePath, //
435                                        templateCharset, //
436                                        templateMediaType, //
437                                        templateString, //
438                                        templateContentType, //
439                                        templateEscaper, //
440                                        templateFormatter, //
441                                        lastLoaded, //
442                                        model);
443
444                }
445
446                private static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePathOnElement(AnnotatedElement a) {
447                        var path = a.getAnnotation(JStachePath.class);
448                        if (path != null) {
449                                return path;
450                        }
451                        var config = a.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
452                        if (config != null && config.pathing().length > 0) {
453                                return config.pathing()[0];
454                        }
455                        return null;
456                }
457
458                sealed interface StaticProvider<P> {
459
460                        default @Nullable Class<?> autoToNull(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
461                                if (type == null) {
462                                        return null;
463                                }
464                                if (type.equals(autoProvider())) {
465                                        return null;
466                                }
467                                return type;
468                        }
469
470                        default Class<?> nullToDefault(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
471                                Class<?> c = autoToNull(type);
472                                if (c == null) {
473                                        return defaultProvider();
474                                }
475                                return c;
476                        }
477
478                        String providesMethod(Class<?> type);
479
480                        Class<?> autoProvider();
481
482                        Class<?> defaultProvider();
483
484                        @Nullable
485                        Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache);
486
487                        Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config);
488
489                        default Class<?> findProvider(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) {
490                                @Nullable
491                                Class<?> provider = autoToNull(providerFromJStache(jstache));
492                                if (provider != null) {
493                                        return provider;
494                                }
495                                provider = findAnnotations(modelType, JStacheConfig.class)
496                                                .map(config -> autoToNull(providerFromConfig(config))).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
497                                                .orElse(null);
498                                return nullToDefault(provider);
499                        }
500
501                        default Entry<Class<?>, P> providesFromModelType(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) throws Exception {
502                                var t = findProvider(modelType, jstache);
503                                return Map.entry(t, provides(t));
504                        }
505
506                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
507                        default P provides(Class<?> type) throws Exception {
508                                String provides = providesMethod(type);
509                                var method = type.getMethod(provides);
510                                Object r = method.invoke(provides);
511                                return (P) r;
512                        }
513
514                }
515
516                enum EscaperProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<String, String>> {
517
518                        INSTANCE;
519
520                        @Override
521                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
522                                return UnspecifiedContentType.class;
523                        }
524
525                        @Override
526                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
527                                return Html.class;
528                        }
529
530                        @Override
531                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
532                                return null;
533                        }
534
535                        @Override
536                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
537                                return config.contentType();
538                        }
539
540                        @Override
541                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
542                                JStacheContentType a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
543                                return a.providesMethod();
544                        }
545
546                        public Function<String, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> contentType) throws Exception {
547                                contentType = nullToDefault(contentType);
548                                if (contentType.equals(Html.class)) {
549                                        return Html.provider();
550                                }
551                                else if (contentType.equals(PlainText.class)) {
552                                        return PlainText.provider();
553                                }
554                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(contentType);
555                        }
556
557                }
558
559                enum FormatterProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<@Nullable Object, String>> {
560
561                        INSTANCE;
562
563                        @Override
564                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
565                                return UnspecifiedFormatter.class;
566                        }
567
568                        @Override
569                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
570                                return DefaultFormatter.class;
571                        }
572
573                        @Override
574                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
575                                return null;
576                        }
577
578                        @Override
579                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
580                                return config.formatter();
581                        }
582
583                        @Override
584                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
585                                JStacheFormatter a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheFormatter.class);
586                                return a.providesMethod();
587                        }
588
589                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> formatterType) throws Exception {
590                                formatterType = nullToDefault(formatterType);
591                                if (formatterType.equals(DefaultFormatter.class)) {
592                                        return DefaultFormatter.provider();
593                                }
594                                else if (formatterType.equals(SpecFormatter.class)) {
595                                        return SpecFormatter.provider();
596                                }
597                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(formatterType);
598                        }
599
600                }
601
602                record SimpleTemplateInfo( //
603                                String templateName, //
604                                String templatePath, //
605                                Charset templateCharset, //
606                                String templateMediaType, //
607                                String templateString, //
608                                Class<?> templateContentType, //
609                                Function<String, String> templateEscaper, //
610                                Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter, //
611                                long lastLoaded, //
612                                Class<?> modelClass) implements TemplateInfo {
613
614                        @Override
615                        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
616                                return modelClass().isAssignableFrom(type);
617                        }
618
619                }
620
621        }
622
623}
